Description: Normal 0 false false false EN-US JA X-NONE Stellar Mercury 001 Elite – Vintage Sunburst Flametop Maple, Singlecut Electric Guitar The Factory Direct Music difference Manufacturer direct savings 30-Day money back guarantee 5-year warranty We love our customers! All guitars are professionally setup in-house prior to shipping by our resident guitar luthier who brings his knowledge from his time working as a PRS neck-specialist in Maryland to your guitar today Florida-based family-owned musical instrument distributor, since 2001 Condition and Comments · Pre-owned: This guitar has two dings on the side of the body through to the wood. It also has a dent in the top neck binding near the first fret, which may affect play-ability. Besides these three blemishes the guitar is in great condition. Very classic guitar! The guitar comes made out of a thick flametop maple cap (NOT a veneer!) and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark rosewood fretboard. The flame maple top is stained with a gold sunburst that fades to black, which looks amazing against the red stained mahogany backside. This is such a great vintage look for this style of guitar. The fretboard is rich and dark which also gives an excellent contrast to the shine of the highly detailed pearloid inlays. This guitar has two Stellar OSR humbucker pickups. These pickups give the guitar long sustains that sound excellent with a classic tone that is exactly what you would expect from this kind of guitar. The D-Shape slimline neck is as fast as you are. The medium jumbo frets are shiny, professionally crowned & leveled by hand. This guitar comes made out of a thick flame maple cap (NOT a veneer!) and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark brown rosewood fret board. Specs Body: Maple flametop and mahogany body, cream binding, polyurethane clear finish Neck: 24.75” scale, D-Shape profile neck, 1 11/16” nut, polyurethane clear finish Fretboard: Dark rosewood, medium jumbo frets, pearloid Inlays, cream binding Headstock: Angled headstock, painted black on face, cream binding Electronics: x2 Stellar OSR humbucker pickups, 2x volume knob, 2x tone knob, 3-way toggle switch Hardware: Stoptail bridge, diecast tuners, chrome hardware MER001P-VSBR
Title: Stellar Mercury 001 Elite -Vintage Sunburst Flametop, Singlecut Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: There are two dents through to the wood on the side of the body of the guitar.  There is also a dent in the top neck binding by the first fret that may affect playability.
